title: Virtual Space-Based Multicultural Communication Leadership Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device operation skills and elementary education field experience
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented program for school administrators/leaders to enhance multicultural classroom management skills, cultivating decision-making abilities by simulating real classroom scenarios in VR environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply effective communication strategies in over 80% of conflict situations with multicultural students in VR simulation environments.
Learners achieve over 75% accuracy in cross-cultural understanding-based decision-making in virtual classroom management simulations.
Learners improve their educational leadership competency index by over 20% through simulation-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
